CustomField.description: If selected / checked, horizon time is considered as Midnight / 00:00:00 instead of current time for Horizon Start / Finish. i.e. Assuming Horizon Start as yyyy/mm/dd 14:30:00. If this is selected / checked, then HorizonStart will be yyyy/mm/dd 00:00:00 else yyyy/mm/dd 14:30:00.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If selected / checked, horizon time is considered as Midnight / 00:00:00 instead of current time for Horizon Start / Finish. i.e. Assuming Horizon Start as yyyy/mm/dd 14:30:00. If this is selected / checked, then HorizonStart will be yyyy/mm/dd 00:00:00.
CustomField.label: Consider Time From Midnight
